subject: Order not yet shipped
description_text:
Hello,

I've placed my order a week ago, and i still dont have any shipping
information
Can you explain why its not shipped yet?  Order #SSN5960

Thank you

conversations.body_text: Hi Justin Bernardus,  We apologize for the delay. Two shipments destined for our German warehouse have been affected by heavy snowfall in Europe, causing road blockages and delivery delays. We will expedite delivery or explore alternative logistics channels to ship your order from China as soon as possible.

Hello,

Thank you for the quick explanation and for looking into alternative
shipping options. I completely understand that weather can cause
unavoidable delays.

Since I am facing an unexpected wait, I was wondering if there is any
flexibility to adjust my Order #SSN5960—perhaps by upgrading it to the VAM
Pro model? It would certainly make the extended anticipation worthwhile.

I appreciate your efforts.

Best regards,

Justin

On Fri, 16 Jan 2026 at 12:50, service@simsonn.com

Hi Justin Bernardus,  ​The warehouse will ship the products according to what you ordered when placing the order. We will refund the extra shipping fee you paid based on the delay. You don't need to worry; our products will definitely make your wait worthwhile!

Hi,

Thank you for your response
Can you still give an estimate of the shipping time?

Thank you

On Mon, 19 Jan 2026 at 10:58, service@simsonn.com
Hi Justin Bernardus,  ​We haven't been notified of the specific time yet, but what we do know is that it's not expected to take too long. Thank you very much for your patience.
